ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_women] gender article
ygData.msgSnippet: Now what we need is a sruvey on whether ther are ANY women out ther who play men.  I have not yet met a single one, though I did meet a man playing a woman who
ygData.messageBody:
Now what we need is a sruvey on whether ther are ANY women out ther who play men.  I have not yet met a single one, though I did meet a man playing a woman who said his wife plays a male warrior.  I have contemplated giving it a try, but to be perfectly honest, I'm not sure I want to explore trying to RPG a male.  I'm not sure that's a good thing.  I think it may represent a very real limitation on my take of the world.  Hmmm....

Anyone out there try?

Iceiallana
Druid of the 37th circle
Brell Serilis

Christina Norman wrote:

From: Christina Norman <tina@...>
